strategy: Apply a random forest ensemble with bootstrap aggregating (bagging) and perform target encoding on categorical variables using group-wise mean imputation, while also introducing interaction terms between continuous features like Age and Fare to capture non-linear relationships. This strategy leverages ensemble robustness and domain-aware feature construction without relying on deep learning or gradient boosting.
